definition: after wine, spit out the truth/in vino veritas
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
both sides are willing/by mutual consent
to puff up/to swell up/to inflate/to blow air into sth/(fig.) to encourage/to support
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: when hungry, you can't pick what you eat (idiom); beggars can't be choosers/When matters are urgent, don't spend time choosing alternatives.
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
